casebody.data:
TERRACE VIEW GARDENS, PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT, v. TOWNSHIP OF DOVER, DEFENDANT-RESPONDENT. Superior Court of New Jersey Appellate Division Argued February 22, 1983 Decided March 15, 1983.

Before Judges MILMED, MORTON I. GREENBERG and FURMAN.

Edward G. Rosenblum argued the cause for plaintiff-appellant (Rosenblum & Rosenblum, attorneys). Edmund J. Corrigan, Assistant Township Attorney for the Township of Dover, argued the cause for respondent (James E. Madden, Township Attorney, attorney). PER CURIAM.

The April 30, 1982 Judgment of Dismissal under review is affirmed substantially for the reasons expressed by Judge Rimm in his opinion of the same date for the Tax Court, 5 N.J.Tax 469.
